action.comment: Water jet on pull for non IN+PC talent combos
Actions while Prismatic Crystal is active
Safeguards against losing FoF and BF to buff expiry
Frozen Orb usage without Prismatic Crystal
Single target routine; Rough summary: IN2 > FoF2 > CmS > IN > BF > FoF
Camp procs and spam Frostbolt while 4T17 buff is up

action_detail.name: potion
action_detail.description: Increases your intellect by $s1 for $d.

action_detail.name: frostbolt
action_detail.description: Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy, causing $s2 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by $s1% for $d.

action_detail.name: frostfire_bolt
action_detail.description: Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing $?a57761[${$m2*1.25} to ${$M2*1.25}][$s2] Frostfire damage and slowing the target's movement by $s1% for $d.

action_detail.name: frozen_orb
action_detail.description:
Launches a Frozen Orb forward from the Mage's position, releasing Frostbolts that deal $84721s2 Frost damage to all nearby enemy targets for $d. Grants the Mage 1 charge of Fingers of Frost when it first reaches a target.
Targets damaged by the Frost Orb are slowed by $84721s1% for $84721d.

action_detail.name: frozen_orb_bolt
action_detail.description: $@spelldesc84714

action_detail.name: ice_lance
action_detail.description:
Deals $?a44544[${$m1*$<fingersMult>} to ${$M1*$<fingersMult>}][$s1] Frost damage to an enemy target$?s56377&!a44544[, and ${$m1*$56377m2/100} to ${$M1*$56377m2/100} Frost damage to a second nearby target][]$?s56377&a44544[, and ${$m1*$<fingersMult>*$56377m2/100} to ${$M1*$<fingersMult>*$56377m2/100} Frost damage to a second nearby target][].
Ice Lance damage is doubled against frozen targets.
Replaces Fire Blast.

action_detail.name: ice_nova
action_detail.description:
Causes a whirl of icy wind around the target enemy or ally, dealing $s2 Frost damage to all enemies within $A2 yards, and freezing for $d. A primary enemy target will take $s1% increased damage. Max 2 charges.
Replaces Frost Nova.

action_detail.name: icicle
action_detail.description: $@spelldesc76613

action_detail.name: icicle
action_detail.description: $@spelldesc76613

action_detail.name: icy_veins
action_detail.tooltip: $?$w3>0[Multistrike chance increased by $w3%][Haste increased by $w1%] and immune to pushback.
action_detail.description: Accelerates your spellcasting, granting $?s56364[$s3% multistrike chance][$m1% haste] and preventing spell pushback.$?s56374[ Casting Icy Veins removes all movement slowing and cast time slowing effects.][] Lasts $d.

action_detail.name: mirror_image
action_detail.description: Creates $s2 copies of the caster nearby, which cast spells and attack the Mage's enemies. Lasts $55342d.

action_detail.name: prismatic_crystal
action_detail.description:
Conjures a prismatic crystal at the target location, which is attackable by only the Mage, and takes $?s84714[$s3][$155153s1]% additional damage.
When the crystal takes damage, it instantly releases a burst of energy dealing that damage, split evenly between all enemies within 8 yards.

action_detail.name: shattered_bleed
action_detail.description: Inflicts $s1 Bleed damage, plus an additional $o2 damage over $d.

action_detail.name: water_jet
action_detail.tooltip: Taking $s1 damage every $t1 sec. Frostbolts from the Water Elemental's owner that hit the target will grant a charge of Fingers of Frost.
action_detail.description:
Channels a jet of icy water at the target, dealing $o1 Frost damage to the target over $d.
The Mage's Frostbolts that hit the target while it is being blasted with icy water will grant a charge of Fingers of Frost.

action_detail.name: waterbolt
action_detail.description: Deals $s1 Frost damage to the target.

action_detail.name: frostbolt
action_detail.description: Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy, causing $s2 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by $s1% for $d.
